A motivated, enthusiastic and well-organised developer, with a keen eye for beautiful design and fluent functionalty. I love reaching out to people who want to join the tech industry, helping out with resources and mentorship sessions. Away from my laptop, I play and teach the piano.

testimonials.text: Stephen is a very good team mate and friend. Articulate and well organized when it comes to achieveing targets and goals. His quest for knowledge has made him unique in his approach to problem solving.
